meanings.definition: A strong, coarse fabric used for making mattress and pillow covers.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother's old mattress was covered with rough bedticks.
meanings.sent2: The bedticks on the pillows felt scratchy against my cheek.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy thought the bedticks were a fun chew toy.
meanings.sent4: The bedticks of society hold us together, even in rough times.
meanings.sent5: The bedticks were so sturdy, they could withstand years of use without tearing.

meanings.definition: A small, blood-sucking insect that lives in bedding and feeds on human blood.
meanings.sent1: After camping in the woods, I found bedticks on my sleeping bag.
meanings.sent2: The bedticks infesting the bed caused itchy red bumps on my skin.
meanings.sent3: The bedticks seemed to have a party on my bed while I was away!
meanings.sent4: The bedticks of anxiety feed on our peace of mind, draining us slowly.
meanings.sent5: The bedticks were so tiny yet caused so much discomfort with their bites.
